title: Potato Leek Soup
ingredients: 1-2 sprigs fresh thyme or 1/2 tsp dried thyme
White or black pepper to taste
instructions: 1) Clean and cut the leeks. Cut off the roots. Cut lengthwise, fan them open under running water, cut off dark green tops and discard. Slice the white and light green parts into 1/4 inch slices. Complete cleaning in cold water.
Cook leeks in melted butter to soften. Cover pot and lower heat to low, cook for 10 min (not browned).
Add broth, potatoes, herbs, salt. Simmer and cook for 20-30 min.
Add parsley and season to taste.
